name: Tool Usage Report
description: Monthly report on which OpenClaw tools are used most/least, with optimization suggestions

schedule.rationale: First day of month - natural boundary for monthly review

payload.message:

configuration.schedule: Monthly (1st of month). Quarterly (*/3) if preferred.
configuration.data_source: Session logs - requires access to tool call history
configuration.analysis_depth: 30 days default. Adjust in prompt for different windows.
configuration.delivery: Telegram by default. Change to preferred channel or main session.

recommendedFor: Users wanting to maximize OpenClaw value
Teams training agents on tool selection
tips: Pair with tool-discovery to systematically adopt underused tools
Track trends across multiple months to identify seasonal patterns
Use to justify OpenClaw subscription tiers (if applicable)
Share with team to standardize tool usage patterns
